title: Dry Zone Urban Water and Sanitation Project - Tender for Supply and Laying of DI, HDPE & PVC Pipes, Special Fittings and Valves for Transmission Mains and Distribution System in Vavuniya WSS
decision_details: - the above project is being implemented by the National Water Supply and Drainage Board with the contributions from the Government of Sri Lanka and loan funds provided by the Asian Development Bank. The proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above contract as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
